# hyper.nvim

A [Lua](https://www.lua.org/) port of the [Hyper.vim](https://github.com/jdsimcoe/hyper.vim) theme for [Neovim](https://neovim.io/) with a few personal tweaks.

![Hyper.nvim example](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/93501477/294810904-21a32e50-5111-4f56-ab80-81989dd95334.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..lQ4QMrvNbNkZtu-y_9D2MtikexGOHR3QuPF_2YRhlnM)

# Installation and usage

Install via your favorite plugin manager, for example [packer](https://github.com/wbthomason/packer.nvim):

```lua
require 'paulo-granthon/hyper.nvim'
```

Enable the colorscheme:

```lua
require 'hyper'.load()
```
